6 #include <actionlib/server/simple_action_server.h>
7 #include <std_msgs/UInt8.h>
8 #include <functional>
9 #include <dynamic_reconfigure/DoubleParameter.h>
10 #include <dynamic_reconfigure/Reconfigure.h>
11 #include <dynamic_reconfigure/Config.h>
12 #include <smacc_tool_plugin_template/ToolControlAction.h>
13 #include <smacc_tool_plugin_template/ToolControlActionResult.h>
14 #include <smacc_tool_plugin_template/ToolControlResult.h>
15 #include <memory>
16 #include <visualization_msgs/MarkerArray.h>
17 
18 typedef actionlib::SimpleActionServer<smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlAction> Server;
19 
20 // This class describes a preemptable-on/off tool action server to be used from smacc
21 // shows in rviz a sphere whoose color describe the current state (unknown, running, idle)
22 class ToolActionServer
23 {
24 public:
25  std::shared_ptr<Server> as_ ;
26 
27  ros::Publisher stateMarkerPublisher_;
28 
29  smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlGoal cmd;
30 
31  uint8_t currentState_;
32 
38  ToolActionServer()
39  {
40  currentState_ = smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlResult::STATE_UNKNOWN;
41  }
42 
48 void publishFeedback() // Note: "Action" is not appended to DoDishes here
49 {
50  smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlFeedback feedback_msg;
51 
52  as_->publishFeedback(feedback_msg);
53 }
54 
60 void execute(const smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlGoalConstPtr& goal) // Note: "Action" is not appended to DoDishes here
61 {
62  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Tool action server request: "<< *goal);
63  cmd = *goal;
64 
65  if(goal->command == smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlGoal::CMD_START)
66  {
67  currentState_ = smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlResult::STATE_RUNNING;
68  }
69  else if (goal->command == smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlGoal::CMD_STOP)
70  {
71  currentState_ = smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlResult::STATE_IDLE;
72  }
73 
74  // 10Hz internal loop
75  ros::Rate rate(20);
76 
77  while(ros::ok())
78  {
79  if(as_->isPreemptRequested())
80  {
81  // a new request is being executed, we will stop this one
82  ROS_WARN("ToolActionServer request preempted. Forgetting older request.");
83  as_->setPreempted();
84  return;
85  }
86 
87  publishFeedback();
88  publishStateMarker();
89  rate.sleep();
90  }
91 
92  // never reach succeded because were are interested in keeping the feedback alive
93  as_->setSucceeded();
94 }
95 
101 void run()
102 {
103  ros::NodeHandle n;
104  ROS_INFO("Creating tool action server");
105 
106  as_ = std::make_shared<Server>(n, "tool_action_server", boost::bind(&ToolActionServer::execute, this, _1), false);
107  ROS_INFO("Starting Tool Action Server");
108 
109  stateMarkerPublisher_ = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>("tool_markers", 1);
110 
111  as_->start();
112 
113  ros::spin();
114 }
115 
121 void publishStateMarker()
122 {
123  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
124  marker.header.frame_id = "base_link";
125  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now ();
126 
127  marker.ns = "tool_namespace";
128  marker.id = 0;
129  marker.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
130  marker.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
131 
132  marker.scale.x = 0.2;
133  marker.scale.y = 0.2;
134  marker.scale.z = 0.2;
135 
136  marker.color.a = 1;
137 
138  if(currentState_ == smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlResult::STATE_RUNNING)
139  {
140  // show green ball
141  marker.color.r = 0;
142  marker.color.g = 1;
143  marker.color.b = 0;
144  }
145  else if (currentState_ == smacc_tool_plugin_template::ToolControlResult::STATE_IDLE)
146  {
147  // show gray ball
148  marker.color.r = 0.7;
149  marker.color.g = 0.7;
150  marker.color.b = 0.7;
151  }
152  else
153  {
154  // show black ball
155  marker.color.r = 0;
156  marker.color.g = 0;
157  marker.color.b = 0;
158  }
159 
160  marker.pose.orientation.w=1;
161  marker.pose.position.x=0;
162  marker.pose.position.y=0;
163  marker.pose.position.z=1;
164 
165  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray ma;
166  ma.markers.push_back(marker);
167 
168  stateMarkerPublisher_.publish(ma);
169 }
170 };
171 
177 int main(int argc, char** argv)
178 {
179  ros::init(argc, argv, "tool_action_server_node");
180  ToolActionServer toolActionServer;
181  toolActionServer.run();
182 
183  return 0;
184 }
